definitions.definition: Any of a group of viruses which insert a copy of their RNA genome into the DNA of a host cell , thus changing the genome of that cell.
A computer virus that seeks to attack antivirus programs in an attempt to avoid detection.

main_definition: ( virology ) Any of a group of viruses which insert a copy of their RNA genome into the DNA of a host cell , thus changing the genome of that cell.
secondary_definitions: ( computer security ) A computer virus that seeks to attack antivirus programs in an attempt to avoid detection.
